data.title: EnergyRite Residential Pool Heater
data.text:
Lochinvar EnergyRiteÂ® pool and spa heaters let homeowners have it all: fast, reliable heating and dependable operation.

5 Models from 150,000 to 400,000 Btu/hr

Commercial-Grade Heat Exchanger

Optional Cupro-Nickel Heat Exchanger

Bronze Header Option Available on All Models

Indoor/Outdoor Venting

Advanced Display with Soft Touch Controls

ASME Construction Available

We are a leading producer of energy-efficient water heating solutions that are radically simple, brilliantly engineered and perfectly suited for most any application. We focus solely on serving the unique needs of each customer with a product portfolio including boilers, water heaters, pool heaters, cogeneration products and commercial package systems.
